name: The Commander
mission: Combine all dashboards using waterfall loading logic to produce the final unified assessment.

morning_brief.why_it_matters: The critical shock in USD/JPY signals heightened market turbulence, potentially indicating intervention or risk aversion. This could trigger further volatility across asset classes and warrant immediate attention to portfolio exposure.
morning_brief.cross_dashboard_convergence: The USD/JPY shock (Risk) amplifies caution, aligning with the neutral crypto momentum and macro indicators. Breakthroughs (6) may offer opportunities amid the uncertainty, while the 'Wait for clarity' strategy suggests holding positions until the impact of forex volatility stabilizes.
morning_brief.optional_deep_insight: The CRITICAL SHOCK in USD/JPY may stem from central bank intervention or panic-driven selling, creating a ripple effect on commodities and equities. Investors should monitor yen crosses and safe-haven flows, as breakthroughs in tech or green energy could provide counterbalancing momentum if risk sentiment rebounds.
morning_brief.summary_sentence: Risk shows the environment, crypto shows sentiment, macro shows the wind, breakthroughs show the future, strategy shows the stance, and knowledge shows the long-term signal — combine all six to guide the user clearly through today.

internal_summary_sentence: Risk shows the environment, crypto shows sentiment, macro shows the wind, breakthroughs show the future, strategy shows the stance, and knowledge shows the long-term signal — combine all six to guide the user clearly through today.
